General.Name: Shanghai Jinjiang International Travel Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Jinjiang International Travel Co., Ltd. engages in the travel agency business. It organizes outbound and domestic travel services for Chinese citizens; and inbound travel services for overseas tourists. The company also offers sightseeing tours, leisure vacations, conference, and exhibitions; and tourism consulting services. In addition, it offers property management, interior decoration, and immigration services. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China. Shanghai Jinjiang International Travel Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shanghai Jinjiang Capital Co., Ltd.
